gw.cc.policy.entity

Interface PolicySearchCriteria

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface PolicySearchCriteria
extends java.io.Serializable
    PolicySearchCriteria null

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(Claim claim)
      Initializes the search criteria based on the supplied Claim.
      IQueryBeanResult<PolicySummary> performSearch()
      Returns a QueryProcessor containing a set of PolicySummaries that match the search criteria.
      boolean validateAtLeastOneFieldSet()
      Validate the criteria are sufficient to do a search by checking that at least one field is set.

    • Method Detail

      • performSearch

        IQueryBeanResult<PolicySummary> performSearch()
        Returns a QueryProcessor containing a set of PolicySummaries that match the search criteria.
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor containing a set of PolicySummaries that match the search criteria

      • initialize

        void initialize(Claim claim)
        Initializes the search criteria based on the supplied Claim. This sets the loss date and loss type from the claim; if the claim has a policy, this also sets the policy type and, if the ShowCurrentPolicyNumberInSelectPolicyDialog system parameter is true, sets the policy number.
        Parameters:
        claim - the Claim to use in initializing the search criteria

      • validateAtLeastOneFieldSet

        boolean validateAtLeastOneFieldSet()
        Validate the criteria are sufficient to do a search by checking that at least one field is set.
        Returns:
        true if valid, false if not
